Hobbies

In my free time I enjoy working with my hands. I love to build things, both virtually and physically. I find it rewarding to fix things around the home and perform my own car maintenance. One of my next projects is building a ShapeOKO CNC router. I'm excited to mill my own robot parts. >>ShapeOKO Info

Volunteering

I volunteer as a carpenter with Habitat for Humanity. For those that don't know, Habitat for Humanity is a nonprofit organization that helps families by helping them build homes. The family that is to receive the house We believe affordable housing plays a critical role in strong and stable communities. >>habitat.org/
